subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|殺鼠|さっそ}}: [[killing]] [[rodents]]
* {{ja-r|鼠蹊|そけい}}: [[groin]]
* {{ja-r|天鼠|てんそ}}: [[bat]]
* {{ja-r|田鼠|でんそ}}: [[mole]]
* {{ja-r|飛鼠|ひそ}}: [[bat]]
* {{ja-r|野鼠|やそ}}: field [[rodents]], wild [[rodents]]
* {{ja-r|栗鼠|りす}}: [[squirrel]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Mouse}} {{wikipedia|Rat}} {{wikipedia|Muroidea}} {| style="float:right;clear:both;padding:0px;margin-right:-5px;" | [[File:Мышь_2.jpg|thumb|none|119px|{{m|ja|鼠|tr=nezumi}}: a '''[[mouse]]''', as a smaller example of a ''nezumi''.]] | [[File:Rat_noir.jpg|thumb|none|119px|{{m|ja|鼠|tr=nezumi}}: a '''[[rat]]''', as a larger example of a ''nezumi''.]] |- | [[File:Feldmaus_Microtus_arvalis.jpg|thumb|none|119px|{{m|ja|鼠|tr=nezumi}}: a member of [[family]] ''[[Muroidea]]'': a common '''[[vole]]'''.]] |
 
{{m|ja|鼠|tr=nezumi}} → [[鼠色#Japanese|鼠色]] (''nezumi-iro'', literally “mouse color”): the color '''[[grey]]'''.
|}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ねずみ}} Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=ねずみ|根|tr1=ne|t1=root|pos1=more specifically signifying somewhere hidden away|住み|tr2=sumi|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{ja-l|住む}} ''sumu'', “to live in a place, to reside”}}, meaning roughly “one who lives in hidden places”. {{rendaku2|sort=ねずみ|sumi|zumi}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|赤鼠|あかねずみ}}: [[large Japanese field mouse]]
* {{ja-r|家鼠|いえねずみ}}: domestic [[rodent]] ([[brown rat]], [[black rat]], and [[house mouse]])
* {{ja-r|鬼天竺鼠|おに てんじく ねずみ}}: [[capybara]]
* {{ja-r|絹毛鼠|きぬげ ねずみ}}: [[hamster]]
* {{ja-r|熊鼠|くま ねずみ}}: [[black rat]]
* {{ja-r|地鼠|じ ねずみ}}: [[white-toothed shrew]]
* {{ja-r|田鼠|た ねずみ}}: field [[rodent]], wild [[rodent]]; [[black rat]] and related species
* {{ja-r|旅鼠|たび ねずみ}}: [[lemming]]
* {{ja-r|地鼠|ち ねずみ}}: [[large Japanese field mouse]]
* {{ja-r|天竺鼠|てんじく ねずみ}}: [[guinea pig]]
* {{ja-r|尖鼠|とがり ねずみ}}: [[shrew]]
* {{ja-r|溝鼠|どぶ ねずみ}}: [[brown rat]]

* {{ja-r|鼠色|ねずみ いろ}}: {{qualifier|UK}} [[grey]], {{qualifier|US}} [[gray]]
* {{ja-r|鼠衣|ねずみごろも}}: simple [[grey]] [[clerical]] [[robes]]
* {{ja-r|鼠食|ねずみくい}}: something that has been [[chew]]ed on by [[mouse|mice]] or [[rat]]s
* {{ja-r|鼠穴|ねずみあな}}: a [[mousehole]], a [[rathole]]
* {{ja-r|火鼠|ひ ねずみ}}: fire rat
* {{ja-r|水畑鼠|みずはた ねずみ}}: the [[European]] [[water vole]], ''[[Arvicola amphibius]]'', formerly ''[[Arvicola terrestris]]''.
* {{ja-r|野鼠|の ねずみ}}: wild [[rodent]] ([[large Japanese field mouse]], [[Japanese grass vole]], [[Japanese red-backed vole]], etc)
* {{ja-r|野良鼠|のら ねずみ}}: [[white-toothed shrew]]; [[Japanese shrew mole]]; [[Japanese dormouse]]
* {{ja-r|畑鼠|はた ねずみ}}: [[Japanese grass vole]]; [[vole]]
* {{ja-r|二十日鼠|はつか ねずみ}}: [[house mouse]]
* {{ja-r|針鼠|はり ねずみ}}: [[hedgehog]]
* {{ja-r|火鼠|ひ ねずみ}}: fire rat
* {{ja-r|谷地鼠|やち ねずみ}}: [[red-backed vole]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ねず}}

[[abbreviation|Abbreviation]] of ''nezumi''. Used in some compounds.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ね}}

[[abbreviation|Abbreviation]] of ''nezumi''. Used in some compounds.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ね}}
* The pitch accent is determined by the entire compounded term.
